EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery (Phase 2).Send Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Want More Staff at Your Deli & Bakery—Without Hiring?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Would your customers prefer shorter lines at the bakery or deli?
More staff to fulfill their orders—faster—in your prepared foods department?
What if you had extra associates to keep shelves stocked and assist customers with personal service on the spot?
It’s all possible without raising your labor costs.
Learn how in our latest article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
